sentences.sContent: Look at the clever acrobat on the tightrope.
sentences.sContent_eng: Look at the clever acrobat on the tightrope.
sentences.sCn: 快看，那个灵巧的杂技演员在走绷索。

sentences.sContent: The acrobat is good at juggling with plates.
sentences.sContent_eng: The acrobat is good at juggling with plates.
sentences.sCn: 那个杂技演员很擅长耍盘子。

synos.tran: 杂技演员，特技演员；随机应变者；翻云覆雨者，善变者

remMethod.val: acro(高) + bat(走) → 高空走的人 → 杂技演员

trans.tranCn: 特技演员， 杂技演员
trans.tranOther: someone who entertains people by doing difficult physical actions such as walking on their hands or balancing on a high rope, especially at a  circus
